div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 08:55 am CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 67. Northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.
Clear, with a low around 45. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 72. Light northwest wind increasing to 5 to 10 mph in the morning.

h3.a: SHS Seniors to appear on NPR

div.p: HS Seniors 2020 have been selected to appear on NPR this Sunday morning for their original student podcast "Strawberries In the Death Capital"! The Class of 2020 just made history! Ms. Phillips will be hosting a Facebook Live watch . . .

h3.a: 3 Year Old Program "You Are My Sunshine"

div.p: The Three-Year olds performed a cute little spring themed show for students, staff, parents, and guests. Good job to the teachers and students. It was a delightful performance!
